Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService
Service interface for handling User database table related operations. This interface defines methods for retrieving User details and registering new
invalid reference 
Users
s.

      User getUserByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a User by their email address.

      Returns:
      the User associated with the given email

      Parameters:
      signupRequest - the request containing the User details
